column4: I can confirm the issue- I get about a ~0.5 sec delay when I deliberately type a noncommand
you could try copying .bahrc from /etc/skel  ackup the curerent one
BloodElf: I get no such delay when I specify a path, e. g. /home/ghoti/asdgafg
BloodElf: so it *may* be a path parsing and/or shell issue.  I'll try installing zsh
